profile:
CUSTOM MADE TO A HIGH STANDARD

Kootenay Interiors offers a wide range of bespoke made to measure Curtains and Drapes, Window Coverings and Soft Furnishings in a large selection of styles and fabric choices.   We specialize in making custom made, hand finished, interlined curtains, roman blinds and window treatments.  With focus is on high quality products and design and making the best possible curtains and window treatments to suit your budget, which you can enjoy for years to come.  Your order is professionally made, hand finished with great care and attention to detail and usually delivered within 4 weeks from receipt of all materials to my workshop. 

We offer an extensive fabric selection from a variety of high quality designers and suppliers, including Vanessa Arbuthnott, Robert Allen, Maxwell, Alendel, Unique Fine Fabrics and more.
